input: Sentence: Samuel dropped a small light pebble and a large heavy rock off a cliff at the same time. Question: Which one hit the ground at the bottom of the cliff first? (A) the pebble (B) the large rock
Sentence: Macy is attending the local Christmas parade. Question: She covers her ears when a marching band comes where? (A) Around the corner (B) Directly in front of her
Sentence: Jimbo's phone book is thicker then his pamphlet. Question: Which one will have more resistance to being torn in two? (A) phone book (B) pamphlet
